SELECT usin.save_name FROM user_seller_image_name usin

WHERE seller_pn = #{value}

SELECT usb.pn, usb.seller_pn, usb.banner_type, usb.image_pn, usb.content, usb.banner_order, i.save_name FROM user_seller_banner usb LEFT OUTER JOIN image i ON usb.image_pn = i.pn WHERE usb.seller_pn = #{userPn} ORDER BY usb.banner_order
SELECT pn, seller_pn AS sellerPn, banner_type AS bannerType, image_pn AS imagePn, content, banner_order AS bannerOrder FROM user_seller_banner WHERE pn = #{eventPn}
SELECT COUNT(pn) FROM user_seller_banner WHERE seller_pn = #{userPn}
SELECT ise.name FROM user_seller_interest usi, interest_section ise WHERE usi.seller_pn = #{properNumber} AND usi.section_pn = pn

SELECT i.pn AS image_pn, i.save_name, usp.pn, usp.name, usp.url, usp.price, usp.order, DATE_FORMAT(usp.input_date, '%Y%m%d') AS input_date FROM user_seller_product usp, image i WHERE usp.seller_pn = #{userPn} AND usp.image_pn = i.pn ORDER BY usp.order ASC
SELECT COUNT(pn) FROM user_seller_product WHERE seller_pn = #{userPn}
SELECT i.pn AS image_pn, i.save_name, usp.pn, usp.name, usp.url, usp.price, usp.order, usp.input_date FROM user_seller_product usp, image i WHERE usp.image_pn = i.pn AND pn = #{productPn}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM count_love WHERE seller_pn = #{properNumber}
